text: The list of players who have scored five or more goals in an NHL game includes only 58 names.Amber, David. "Gaborik and his five goals have some company," ESPN. December 21, 2007; retrieved 2012-3-7. In the National Hockey League (NHL), it is rare for one player to score so many goals in a single event. The most recent instance was Tage Thompson on December 7, 2022. ==Scorers== ;Legend Name Team Date Goals Montreal Canadiens align="right" Montreal Wanderers align="right" Montreal Canadiens
